filesharing.core.client

Class FileClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.client.FileClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class FileClient
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This is a client - it can seed and download files from other clients It connects to a tracker for peer discovery
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Extension for files storing client state
